document_data.mainbody:
Boffo Arglebargle Cosgrove Bullwubble II was a male gnome fighter and owner of the tavern called the Furnitures Fate in the town of Thunderstone in Cormyr in the late 1360s DR.
Boffo, being an eccentric prankster, was usually at the center of brawls in the aptly named Furnitures Fate. When he wasnt, he usually had his bouncer Stig lift him up and hurl the gnome into the fray.
